runs.comm: starts off with a nice lifter outside off which leaves the right-hander, the batsman chases it
wow that's an awesome one which fizzes past McCullum's body, too quick for him

Dropped McCullum swivels and hooks and the ball is in the air for a long time, Tanvir was forward at fine leg and he ran back to take the catch and ended up palming it away towards the rope, one bounce and four
crack! He gives him width outside off and he rolls his wrists and thumps it past backward point
overthrows! McCullum  taps it towards cover and sets off for a quick single, Nazir's throw at the bowler's end is fast and the fielder at mid-on dives but the ball beats him and runs away
inside edge! Lucky escape for Guptill as the ball trickles away past the stumps and down to fine leg
taps it towards cover and sets off for a quick single
strays just a bit on the pads and the ball trickles to the on side
good calling and running again, he just taps it in front of mid-off and sets off
poor delivery and spanked, he sprays it full and wide and he gets underneath the bounce and scoops it over extra cover, the ball rolls away to the rope
loses his radar and sprays it wide down the leg side

excellent reflexes! Not the best of deliveries - full and wide outside off and asking to be smashed on the front foot, Guptill flays at it and the ball catches the thick outside edge and Kamran Akmal falls to his right and plucks it one handed
that's a solid shot, full and wide outside off and he reaches out and spanks it past backward point
poor shot, he flashes his blade at a delivery which kicks up and angles across him
this one fizzes past the bat as he shapes to drive through the off side, misjudges the bounce
takes a pace or two down the crease, reaches out to a wide delivery outside off and scoops it almost one-handed down to deep backward point
kicks up and leaves the right-hander, nearly takes the edge
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side

catching practice, thank you very much, says Fawad Alam, he reaches out to a pitched up delivery outside off and the ball travels quickly off the face of the bat to backward point, Fawad didn't have to move much at all
lands outside off, he lets it go
nice away movement, keeps the right-hander guessing as he reaches out to drive
just a touch wider outside off and Taylor chases it and misses it
gets forward and drives firmly down to point
shapes to drive straight but he ends up getting a leading edge down to point
a little wide outside off and Styris doesn't offer a shot

lousy cricket from both teams and Pakistan will regret this, Taylor taps it to cover and sets off and there's lot of uncertainty in the running, Styris took a pace out of his crease but wasn't interested in the single, Taylor was already half way  down and and he was sent back, Malik wasn't sure whether to thrown directly at the stumps or relay it to a fielder, there was nobody at the stumps and in the end it was a feeble throw to the keeper's end, the batsman dived and he was home
thick edge! well that run-out chance didnt cost anything, he reaches out to a pitched up delivery outside off gets a thick edge on the drive to Akmal
defended to point
gets across and taps it to the on side, tells his partner to stay back
strays down the leg side and luckily for the bowler the ball is hit straight to short fine leg off the pads
pitches it up and the ball moves away from the right-hander, keeps him guessing
full outside off and the outside edge rolls to third man
nice looking shot, full outside off and swinging away, he opens the face of the bat and meets the ball a little late, steers it in the gap at backward point
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
gets across his stumps and shoulders arms
clips it away to square leg

another one bites the dust and New Zealand are in trouble, it was a friendly short delivery which sat up nicely and Styris went for the pull but perhaps didn't spot the fielder in the deep, straight down Umar Akmal's throat at deep square leg
slower delivery and he opens the face of the bat and just squeezes it past backward point
this one comes on quicker off the surface and he manages to keep it away
down the leg side and clipped down to fine leg
gets his bat behind the line, taps it in front of mid-off and sets off quickly
taps it to the off side and he tells his batsman to wait
comes round the wicket and the batsman clips it to midwicket
angles it wide outside off and Broom drives to deep cover
gets right behind the line and pushes it to long-off off the meat of the bat
fuller delivery angling on the pads and he ends up getting a leading edge which sneaks past backward point
the extra bounce catches him by surprise and he manages to fend it off past backward point
drifts on the body and he works it down to fine leg
gets width and he rolls his wrists and cuts but finds backward point
tries something different by coming down the pitch and he whacks it hard but mistimes it to midwicket
nice slower ball, the leg cutter this time, the batsman reads it in time before steering it down to point, Fawad decides not to throw
turns his wrists and clips him down to long-on
pitches it short of a length and Watling shapes to pull him away and keeps the ball along the ground to deep square leg
gets beside the line and chops him down to point
opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
cheeky and it's over the rope! Watling comes down the pitch and Gul drops it really short but gives him width, the batsman adjusts well and upper cuts it over deep backward point
strays on the pads and the ball clips his pads and rolls away fast and fine
steers it to backward point and sets off for the single. Fawad's throw to the bowler's end is wide of the stumps
pushes it to the packed cordon square on the ring on the off side

catching practice again, Broom makes room to try something different and upset the bowler's rhythm, he gets on his knee and tries to slice it over third man but the ball dips and lands straight on Gul's palms
pushes it down the pitch
opens the face and steers it past the covers
chance of a run out! He taps it to Fawad at backward point and turns back, he gives up but luckily the throw was wide
defended to the off side
gets behind the line and defends softly to the off side
pushed to backward point and it's Fawad again, he's been busy there tonight
pulls hard but mistimes it straight to square leg
hits the deck hard and he allows the bouncer to sail over his head

jams out a full delivery to deep cover and the ball rockets to towards the rope but Ajmal shows great commitment to slide and cut it off, even more spectacular was the throw which was directed at the middle of the pitch with no green shirt in sight
hits him on the pads and it's a stifle appeal for an lbw
it's a half tracker which he pulls away to deep square leg
directed at the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
excellent googly, it slices the batsman in half, how did that miss?
another googly, clips his pads perhaps outside leg, Afridi appeals
the faster googly which he manages to keep away just in time, chops it to point
gets forward and taps it to the off side
slow through the air, he pushes it down to long-on
plays a reverse sweep but he fails to make contact, Akmal collects it after the ball lobs off his pads and he appeals for a catch
clips it to backward square leg
gets forward and drives him down to the off side
full outside off and pushed to cover
clips it with the turn to long-on
fires the googly this time and Afridi reckons it was pad first and then bat, the ball rolls to the off side
poor delivery, half tracker and he picks the length early and pulls it down to fine leg
steers him to the off side and he turns back after the single was turned down
pushed to that man Fawad again at backward point, poor throw back to the keeper though
pushed down to long-on
opens the face of the bat and tries to squeeze it past short third man but fails to beat the fielder
gets on his knee and sweeps him hard down to deep square leg
slams it down to long-off
he tries to go over the top by advancing down the pitch, Ajmal cleverly cuts back on the pace and beats the batsman in flight, easy stumping and Watling doesn't have time to drag his foot back
the leading edge almost carries back to the bowler
checks his shot down to cover
clipped to deep square leg
the googly hits the pads first but down the leg side, Afridi appeals
fires it on the stumps and he just manages to chop it away
flashes hard and the top edge drops short of cover point

he fires this one towards the pads on seeing the batsman make a bit of room, the ball clips his pads and hits the top of leg stump, Butler seemed to suggest that he wasn't ready, by the time he looked up Afridi was ready to deliver, perhaps he should have backed away
goes for the slog sweep but it isnt enough to beat Nazir at deep midwicket
makes room and slams it over cover and the fielder just manages to run across and boot it away before the rope
turns it down to gully
goes for the slog and he ends up chopping the ball onto his pads
chips down the track to deposit it over long-on, he gets underneath the ball but doesn't get enough elevation, easy take for Gul
Southee shows how it's done, comes down the pitch and deposits it over deep midwicket

that's the end of the game, Bond pulls a good length delivery and the ball travels flat and quick to deep midwicket, Malik takes it low and close to the turf, no doubt about that, Redmond won't bat because of his groin injury
